summary: "Black Widow" is a 2021 superhero movie about the Marvel character, starring Scarlett Johansson. Set after "Captain America: Civil War," Natasha Romanoff, aka Black Widow, must face her past as a Russian spy. The film was in development for years, with Johansson discussing a solo film since 2010. Directed by Cate Shortland, it's the first in the MCU's Phase Four and was released in theaters and on Disney+ due to the pandemic. It made over $379 million and got positive reviews, but Johansson had a legal dispute with Disney over the release.
title: Black Widow (2021 film)
